thread.title: arm mounted energy launcher v1

comments.text: finally finished this using many new features and decided i would share.
to use, just pull the gas petal to rev up the coils and ignite the cells in each chamber. cells recharge from the recoil, don't worry about running out of juice.
thought it looked cute ☆ in this photo, might delete later. ★ [steamimage: 949590558704199413/57FAB40166A444F8D8FA086D8FBB930FC85EF175/]
